attributes.action: Reduce the cost of university tuition this year
attributes.additional_details: With students not getting full access to the facilities available they will not be getting the full experience of the course/s that they have taken. With a reduction in the cost of university this would make up for the lack of teaching to students, especially those in practical based course. It is understandable that times are strange but students shouldn't have to be pay for a course that they are not getting full access to.
attributes.background: Reduce the cost of tuition in universities as students are not getting full access to the facilities available to them.
